long_description: Featuring a zip-off hood and sleeves, the REI Nevis jacket is a flexible piece that morphs to meet your comfort needs-handy when you're traveling and have outdoor activities on the itinerary. PrimaLoft Eco fill is lightweight, nonbulky and water resistant, yet very warm; core has 100g of fill for extra warmth; sides and hood have 60g of fill for easy movement. Pertex Eco ripstop nylon fabric is windproof up to 60 mph, has a durable water-repellent finish (DWR) and a silky texture. Jacket stows inside its own inner lumbar pocket for packing ease. Includes 2 zip hand pockets and 1 zip chest pocket with a cord port. The REI Nevis jacket has an adjustable hood and hem drawcord; front zipper has a chinguard and a stormflap; brushed collar lining adds a soft touch. Cuff gaskets seal in warmth.
short_description: Featuring a zip-off hood and sleeves, the REI Nevis jacket is a flexible piece that morphs to meet your comfort needs-handy when you're traveling and have outdoor activities on the itinerary.
